articles.title: Mahindra Unveils Thar.e Electric SUV In South Africa - NDTV
articles.description: Apart from the Thar.e, Mahindra also unveiled seven new tractor models at the event in Cape Town, South Africa.
articles.content:
The product's price was not announced at the event
Mahindra & Mahindra, India's fourth largest car manufacturer, unveiled the electric version of the Thar SUV at an event in South Africa on Tues… [+2140 chars]
